rows.label: soul27_P0101
rows.name:
We have to take them on!
Start with melee!

rows.label: soul27_P0102
rows.name:
I'm moving in!
Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul27_P0103
rows.name: Let's take 'em out up close!

rows.label: soul27_P0201
rows.name:
I'll take the first shot!
Make 'em count!

rows.label: soul27_P0202
rows.name: I'm opening fire! Buff me up!

rows.label: soul27_P0203
rows.name:
Is this gonna work?
Try weakening them!

rows.label: soul27_P0301
rows.name:
There! Let's take the
fight to them!

rows.label: soul27_P0302
rows.name:
Let's make this quick!
Cover fire!

rows.label: soul27_P0303
rows.name: Yes! Get those auras going!

rows.label: soul27_P0401
rows.name:
I need to fall back
and recover...

rows.label: soul27_P0402
rows.name:
We're all hurting here!
We need a little boost!

rows.label: soul27_P0403
rows.name:
Forget about me!
Buff yourselves up first!

rows.label: soul27_P0501
rows.name:
Okay, I really do
need to heal!

rows.label: soul27_P0502
rows.name:
I'm getting dizzy...
Patch me up!

rows.label: soul27_P0503
rows.name:
This is nothing!
Buff up and keep fighting!

rows.label: soul27_P0601
rows.name:
It's up to you now...
Hit 'em hard for me...

rows.label: soul27_P0602
rows.name:
Forget about me... Just keep 
shooting and finish them off...

rows.label: soul27_P0603
rows.name:
Use an aura!
I'm gonna need a miracle...

rows.label: soul27_P0701
rows.name:
Got 'em! Now follow
up with a melee strike!

rows.label: soul27_P0702
rows.name:
They felt that one!
Continue fighting at range!

rows.label: soul27_P0703
rows.name:
Yes! Weaken them!
Now's our chance!

rows.label: soul27_P0801
rows.name:
I got a piece of them!
Move in and strike!

rows.label: soul27_P0802
rows.name:
They're freaking out!
Topple them with gunfire!

rows.label: soul27_P0803
rows.name:
Appendage destroyed! Cripple
them while they're reeling!

rows.label: soul27_P0901
rows.name:
Our guns can still reach them!
Finish the job!

rows.label: soul27_P0902
rows.name:
We need to buff up to take
something this big down!

rows.label: soul27_P0903
rows.name:
There's nothing to fear! Show
this behemoth your Overdrive!

rows.label: soul27_P1001
rows.name:
It worked! Close in and
seal the deal!

rows.label: soul27_P1002
rows.name: Nothing to it! Now shoot 'em!

rows.label: soul27_P1003
rows.name:
They're panicking!
Weaken them!

rows.label: soul27_P1101
rows.name: My aura's primed! Follow suit!

rows.label: soul27_P1102
rows.name:
Use an aura so we
can regroup!

rows.label: soul27_P1103
rows.name:
All right! Get that
adrenaline flowing!

rows.label: soul27_P1201
rows.name: Kick into Overdrive, people!

rows.label: soul27_P1202
rows.name:
Unleash your power!
Overdrive!

rows.label: soul27_P1203
rows.name:
Don't lose this momentum!
Use an aura!

rows.label: soul27_C0101
rows.name:
Who's next?
We're coming to you!

rows.label: soul27_C0102
rows.name:
It's not over yet!
Take aim at the next target!

rows.label: soul27_C0103
rows.name:
This is just the beginning!
Buff us up!

rows.label: soul27_C0201
rows.name:
We're untouchable!
Use an aura now!

rows.label: soul27_C0202
rows.name:
Whew! I think it's time
to get buffed up!

rows.label: soul27_C0203
rows.name:
Ha! No sweat! Attack at
range and send 'em running!

rows.label: soul27_C0301
rows.name:
I am on fire! Keep those
melee attacks coming!

rows.label: soul27_C0302
rows.name:
Look at me! Let's finish
this at range!

rows.label: soul27_C0303
rows.name:
Yeah! Give 'em
another thrashing!

rows.label: soul27_C0401
rows.name:
The weather's getting funky
but we can prep for it!

rows.label: soul27_C0402
rows.name:
What the hell is this weather?
Will an aura cover us?

rows.label: soul27_C0403
rows.name:
The enemy's stuck with this
weather too. Weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul27_C0501
rows.name:
Check out my speed!
How about a buff?

rows.label: soul27_C0502
rows.name:
I'll stir them up!
You get us buffed!

rows.label: soul27_C0503
rows.name:
I'll create an opening!
Use Overdrive!

rows.label: soul27_C0601
rows.name:
Wow, thanks! Ready to
charge back in?

rows.label: soul27_C0602
rows.name:
Not bad! Let's see how
you handle a gun!

rows.label: soul27_C0603
rows.name:
Look at this guy!
Use an aura next!

rows.label: soul27_C0701
rows.name:
Thanks! How about
a buff too?

rows.label: soul27_C0702
rows.name:
I owe you! Now I just need
a buff and we're golden!

rows.label: soul27_C0703
rows.name:
Thanks, girl! Get your aura up
and let's do this!

rows.label: soul27_C0801
rows.name:
It's kill or be killed!
Melee position!

rows.label: soul27_C0802
rows.name:
I'm not dead yet!
Gimme some cover fire!

rows.label: soul27_C0803
rows.name:
This is rough, but I can
take it. Just back me up!

rows.label: soul27_C0901
rows.name:
I'm firing from on high!
You try it too!

rows.label: soul27_C0902
rows.name:
This seems like a good
position. Blast away!

rows.label: soul27_C0903
rows.name:
I've got a clear view!
Ranged attacks should work!

rows.label: soul27_C1001
rows.name: Down they go! Smash 'em!

rows.label: soul27_C1002
rows.name:
Pump them with lead
before they get up!

rows.label: soul27_C1003
rows.name:
Toppled 'em!
Now try weakening them!

rows.label: soul27_C1101
rows.name:
Stunned 'em! Now's your
chance to get in there!

rows.label: soul27_C1102
rows.name:
I stopped 'em cold!
Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul27_C1103
rows.name:
Weaken 'em now while
they're stalled!

rows.label: soul27_C1201
rows.name:
Get in close and give 'em
a nice wake-up call!

rows.label: soul27_C1202
rows.name:
What's wrong, sleepy?
Want us to shoot you awake?

rows.label: soul27_C1203
rows.name:
They're asleep!
Move in and surprise 'em!

rows.label: soul27_C1301
rows.name:
Gotcha! Now, move in
and nail 'em!

rows.label: soul27_C1302
rows.name: I'll hold 'em! Fire away!

rows.label: soul27_C1303
rows.name:
I'll try and hold on to 'em.
Move in and calm them down!

rows.label: soul27_C1401
rows.name:
I'm falling apart here!
Fix me up!

rows.label: soul27_C1402
rows.name:
Ugh. We can't fail now.
Fight back with melee attacks!

rows.label: soul27_C1403
rows.name:
I didn't need that part anyway!
Now for us to gun you down!

rows.label: soul27_C1501
rows.name:
Patch me up so we
can counterattack!

rows.label: soul27_C1502
rows.name:
At least I'M still in one piece!
Buff me up so I can fight back!

rows.label: soul27_C1503
rows.name:
My Skell's down for the count!
Time for Overdrive!

rows.label: soul27_C1601
rows.name:
My fuel's running out! I need
something to hold me over!

rows.label: soul27_C1602
rows.name:
Low on fuel, now?!
Help me out!

rows.label: soul27_C1603
rows.name:
I could use help with my fuel
situation! Like right now!
